programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man under the influence states money will buy his freedom after threatening police with a gun. Individuals arrested for possession blame each other. A man arrested for drunk driving becomes unruly.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate swallows a stash of drugs and then comes down with a case of the munchies. A 72-year-old offers an unusual excuse for dealing drugs to teens at a mall, and a woman charged with assaulting a landlord fakes being sick to get out of jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In San Diego, CA an officer grapples with a combative detainee. In Portland, OR six party goers are taken into custody. In Fort Worth, TX a high-risk inmate manages to get the key to his handcuffs.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A high-priced escort is accused of skipping out on her limo tab. A ladies' man directs foul language at the jail nurse, and a seasoned prostitute considers getting into the sex-toy business.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a truculent man is sent to the drunk-tank to sober up. In Portland, OR a drunk woman is jailed for attacking a child. In Sarasota, FL an intoxicated man has difficulty recalling why he's been arrested. In Spokane, WA a man "borrows" a car to curb his drug habit.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Booze and a cellphone dispute lead one man to the “green suit.” A couple of panhandlers profess their undying love to each other. Alcohol pushes a proud father across the line. A homeless woman gives officers career advice.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate's flirting calms a jailhouse fight. An inebriated man tries to avoid his eighth DUI by claiming his car was stolen, and a disagreement over Faecbook puts a couple in jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is charged with possession of a controlled substance. A woman denies assaulting her husband, and two aggressive cousins threaten police and end up in isolation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman refuses to wear jail-issued clothing. A man tells his tearful tale to officers, and a chatty inebriated woman is placed in isolation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: By proclaiming that he is a Gulf War Veteran, a man states he should be imprisoned. A corporal investigates a “prisoner on prisoner assault.” An Officer’s last shift is filled with fireworks.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate fails to impress the staff with his witticisms. A woman boasts about excelling at her DUI field test, and a man learns his wreckless driving has resulted in the death of a man.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man claims royal lineage during a combative booking process. After resisting officers and harboring a vicious animal, a man is arrested. Later, intoxicated individuals create havoc for officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A code red call blares after a fight occurs in the jail’s dorms. Accused of trespassing, a woman removes her clothes from her holding cell. A man is brought into detox after slamming against a cop car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: The night of the Mayweather-Pacquiao fight a woman pummels a nightclub security guard for an unusual reason. A man who claims to have served in the military confronts a Lieutenant and threatens fellow detainees in the holding cell. A “Pac-man” fan has a spat with his Mayweather-backing wife.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT officers break up an altercation between two inmates. In Portland, OR a belligerent man questions the authorities. In Sarasota, FL a man is busted for DUI. In Las Vegas, NV a woman is taken into custody for battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a lewd woman is jailed. In Las Vegas, NV a man is placed in the restraining chair after attempting to bite his own fingers off. In Portland, OR a man is brought in for possession. In Sarasota, FL a homeless man is brought in for trespassing and battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman booked for domestic violence begins screaming and can’t calm down. Two friends arrested for public intoxication embrace in a tearful reunion. Later, a woman is brought in with a stolen car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Portland, OR an intoxicated male suspect is brought in for DUI. In Salt Lake City, UT a happy drunk woman is pleasantly cooperative. An emotional detainee sheds some tears while in isolation. In Las Vegas, NV a man is strapped in a restraining chair.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A violent ruckus ensues after a man is placed in jail. Secret prison communication methods are explored and examined. Later, deputies cautiously extract a disruptive man while his wife is held nearby.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two men are found fighting on security cameras. Meanwhile, an impromptu tattoo jail parlor is discovered and shut down. Later, a Russian man and his mysterious friend are excited to be in a U.S. jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers conduct a strip search after an inmate is accused of carrying contraband. A repeat offender dances for deputies and fellow inmates. High on meth, a man acts erratically during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate is subdued for refusing to follow commands. A woman accused of running out on a dinner bill has her jewelry sawed off in jail. After issuing criminal terrorist threats, a man is jailed.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A strip search reveals a male inmate in women's lingerie. A couple of puppy thieves get amorous in the bathroom, and a pregnant woman is arrested for solicitation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate goes on a rampage when he suspects police of losing his money. Officers have a tough time with a drunk man. An alleged prostitute is stabbed. A drunk trapeze artist takes a drive on his moped.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Toting his guitar, an inmate serenades the officers. One man protests his arrest and states that having cocaine is not a crime. A man claims to be an Iraqi War Veteran and challenges his detainment.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Reno, NV a woman becomes violent with officers after having over indulged in boxed wine. In Salt Lake City, UT a drunk man is brought in for urinating in front of a family restaurant and in attempt to expedite his release he requests that the officers "git 'er done". In Reno, NV a former marine is taken in to custody for domestic abuse.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a belligerent woman is restrained. In Portland, OR a repeat offender is placed in isolation for unruly behavior. In Las Vegas, NV a man opens up about how his friends and family feel about him in a holding cell. In Spokane, WA a man is jailed in an attempt to steal coffee for his friends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A trustee finds himself in hot water after officers discover his contraband stash. A disgruntled oil worker doesn’t think the charge fits the crime after stealing two hedge trimmers. Conflicting accounts arise when an officer and a stylish inmate butt heads in booking. A woman learns to put herself first after failed attempts to help her boyfriend’s addiction land her in prison.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A homeless man punches a singing transient over a racist comment. An assailant hits a sleeping man with a brick over a money dispute. A sobbing young man insists he was falsely arrested. A bar fight sends a UFC fighter to the hospital and the bartender who slugged him to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Prositutes discuss their risqu̩ occupation and explain their fees. An intoxicated woman doesn't want her blood drawn, and two shoplifters face the potential consequences of their actions.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A fight involving female detainees breaks out after one woman accuses the other of staring at her. A man is arrested for shattering the hotel glass door as a result of a fight. An old crooner believes that rap stars are going to bail him out of jail. Handcuffs don’t stop a woman from trying to flirt with an officer.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A dominatrix is arrested for playing rough. A father is accused of assaulting his daughter's boyfriend, and an inmate's negative attitude leads to trouble.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers try to deal with a sloppy and combative drunk. A man gets locked up after he blows all his casino winnings, and a woman gets tricked by her bail bondsman.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies corral a suspect into a cell after serious turmoil. A man becomes suicidal after being brought in on burglary charges. Facing the gavel, a prisoner berates a Judge during court proceedings.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated inmate escapes his restraints. A young woman denies she abused her mother, and a guard removes an inmate who is causing a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT an inebriated man gets aggressive and questions why he's in custody. In Sarasota, FL a couple are taken in for assaulting a bartender. In Portland, OR a man is placed in custody for harassing movie theater security guards. In Las Vegas, NV a chauffeur is placed in custody for amassing a number of of moving violations.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Code Blue alarms sound as inmates start fighting inside the men’s jail. An irate man with a huge beard refuses to remove bands inside his facial hair. A man with deep stab wounds stumbles into jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Texting, drinking and driving are not a good mix for a mother with her baby in the backseat of her car. After his arrest for shoplifting, a young man begins to realize the consequences of his lifestyle choices. A woman arrested on a warrant finds herself in solitary confinement after showing off her assets to another inmate. Officers try to convince a homeless young man that patching up his relationship with his family is better than being drunk on the streets.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Needles are found on one woman while a stun gun is discovered on another. A DUI test stirs up bad memories for a man driving while intoxicated, and a convicted murderer becomes violent.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is brought in for attacking her boyfriend. A talkative inmate is moved to isolation, and an daring inmate attempts to escape his restraints.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Inmates are subdued after exhibiting unruly behavior. Anger drives emotions as a man accuses officers of racial profiling. An officer uses “verbal judo” to gain the upper hand with combative inmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a man is sent to a holding cell after hurling racial insults. In Reno, NV A man outfitted in just his underwear is taken into custody for battery of a police officer. In Portland, OR an intoxicated eldery man breaks into song during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Chaos surrounds a routine medical screening of an inmate. In the prison phone center, a smoking pipe is discovered and a mystery ensues. A pregnant woman is investigated over potential sex crimes.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate interrupts the booking process. A couple is brought in after signs of a domestic dispute but claim they were being intimate, and a jailed woman shares some of her Webcam exploits.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers struggle with an angry man after he kicks out a patrol car window. A relationship ends when a woman takes a bite out of her boyfriend. An upset wife stabs her husband and he ends up in handcuffs. A woman is happy to celebrate her birthday by going to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers have difficulty booking an incomprehensible man. A commotion at a church ends in arrest. A man wearing a tuxedo is detained after mocking officers for wearing “pig suits.”

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate swallows a stash of drugs and then comes down with a case of the munchies. A 72-year-old offers an unusual excuse for dealing drugs to teens at a mall, and a woman charged with assaulting a landlord fakes being sick to get out of jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested for domestic violence threatens to put all the officers in jail. Inmates on kitchen duty get into a fist fight over a dish towel. A woman unsure about her sexual identity is arrested for trespassing at a friend’s home. Officers find an unusual bit of clothing when a man is changed into a jail uniform.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An eccentric jail regular is welcomed back. Man fleeing Mexico details the horrors he escaped. Young woman describes her lucrative fling as a stripper. A woman finds that trying to drink away a bad boyfriend and then asking the boyfriend for bail money is not a good idea. A man collapses during booking after being arrested for drunk driving. Officers have heart to heart with a depressed inmate going through a breakup with a cheating girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Headbutts and aggression abound during a jail fight. A young man is arrested after stealing $1,500 worth of hats. Officers discover a suicidal inmate who’s no longer taking his medication.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A passenger allegedly attacked a cabdriver. A woman describes assaulting her boyfriend with hot food, and a mother is arrested for leaving her kids in a car while gambling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man attacks a medical officer and officers rush to intervene. After destroying a tree and unleashing pigeons, a woman is arrested. Unease is caused by a man’s menacing glare during his booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A vice unit interrogates several individuals accused of sex crimes. Suicidal threats provoke a high-stakes situation within cell walls. Unable to raise bail, a woman is incarcerated for several days.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL an unruly detainee is sent to isolation, twice. In Multnomah county a young man feverishly waits for his release. In Portland, OR a man is jailed for bitting his girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man outfitted in just his underwear is taken into custody. A dad gets busted for DUI while on his way to pick up a pizza for his kids. Officers recover drugs from a suspect’s pocket who is puzzled as to how they got there. A woman learns the hard way “what happens in Vegas stays in Vegas”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers transfer an over caffeinated suspect to isolation so he can unwind. A man arrested for DUI while doing donuts in a mall parking lot asserts he was robbed. A jaywalking Utah man claims someone hit him on the head. A disgruntled detainee lands a sucker punch on a fellow inmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested on drug warrants is upset about the BBQ brisket he left on the grill. An intoxicated ladies' man flirts with the jail staff and an inmate finds it funny that he sold tree leaves as pot to an undercover officer. Brother turns on brother when a good deed gets mixed with alcohol. A man caught panhandling believes officers should arrest hardened criminals instead of him.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A jail chaplain counsels a sad inmate. An intoxicated woman demands to talk to the Canadian Embassy.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man in detention is paranoid about officers handling him inappropriately. A man in custody claims to have a seizure. A man is taken in to custody for stealing videogaming equipment.
